title: Nerf Irelia Riot
body: Riot can u pls nerf irelia..{{champion:39}}

replies.body: What was that? Tanks can deal an insane amount of damage while still being tanky enough to dive your back lines kill both carry's and get out with half health? Better nerf irelia. {{champion:39}} {{item:3070}}
love how irelia has only been nerfed like 4 times lol. there r people who hav been nerfed way more than her lol
Don't know if whiner or meme
